language: East Sumbanese, Umbu Ratu Nggai dialect
East Sumbanese, Umbu Ratu Nggai dialect
Kadazan Dusun of Taginambur, Kota Belud, Sabah, Malaysia

annotation: Kav. forms orig. marked as set 24, along with SHWNG langs. Correspondences aren't implausible (with caveat for unreliability of SHWNG v vs b transcriptions), but seems unlikely. -EG
white (because of being washed and cleaned)
White, especially pure white; devoid of colour, bright, shining; pale, bleached; flaxen, of hair (Fth)
Occurs as an element of names only, meaning pale-coloured (Sma)
(bulu - shade of something? That should not be white)
